metadata.title: Aluminium & Steel Solutions for the Africa of Tomorrow
metadata.description: Discover Alubassa, a Cameroonian company specialized in aluminum and steel processing. Quality products, local expertise, customized solutions.

contactFooter.title: A project? An order? Let's talk about it.

hero.title: Aluminum, our material. Reliability, our commitment.
hero.description: For over 60 years, Alubassa has designed and manufactured aluminum products built to last. Whether for kitchenware, construction, or industry, our products combine strength, precision, and aesthetics.

imageText.title: Local expertise, international quality.
imageText.description1: For over three decades, Alubassa has been transforming aluminum in Cameroon into robust, reliable products tailored to the needs of households, businesses, and construction sites.
imageText.description2: Our mission? To provide every customer with the guarantee of a well-designed, well-finished product made to last.

expertise.title: Over 60 years of experience
expertise.description: Since our founding in 1963, we have perfected our art of aluminum transformation. This rich history allows us to guarantee products of unmatched quality and durability, passed down from generation to generation.

products.title: Durable products for multiple uses.
products.description: We design a wide range of aluminum products for kitchenware, construction, and industrial applications.

whyUs.title: Why do our customers trust us?
whyUs.r4: Custom delivery according to your needs

Apropos.metatitle: About Alubassa – Metallurgical Expertise and Innovation
Apropos.metadescription: Alubassa, a leading player in Central Africa, has been delivering aluminium and steel solutions for industry, construction, and households for over 10 years.
Apropos.name: About
Apropos.title: About Alubassa
Apropos.description1: Alubassa is a Cameroonian company specializing in aluminum transformation and manufacturing of durable metal solutions
Apropos.description2: For over 10 years, we have supported construction professionals, industrial clients, and individuals with reliable, aesthetic products tailored to local requirements. Based in Douala, our factory features modern equipment and a team of experts committed to delivering consistent quality while respecting standards and deadlines.
Apropos.descriptionMission: To provide quality, accessible, and durable aluminum solutions that contribute to building a more resilient and modern built environment in Africa.
Apropos.descriptionValues: To be a national and regional reference in aluminum transformation by combining innovation, reliability, and proximity with our customers.

descriptionExpertise.dex1: Custom sheet metal cutting and bending
descriptionExpertise.dex2: Manufacturing of profiles for construction, furniture, or industrial installations
descriptionExpertise.dex3: Mastery of the complete cycle, from raw material to finished product
descriptionExpertise.dex4: Mastery of the complete cycle, from raw material to finished product

descriptionEngagement.den2: Respected deadlines, even for complex orders
descriptionEngagement.den3: Responsive team attentive to your needs
descriptionEngagement.den4: Local production, serving Cameroonian industrial development

Apropos.equipeDescription: Behind every order is a passionate team. Our technicians, engineers, sales staff, and logistics personnel work together to ensure smooth service and complete customer satisfaction.

products.metatitle: Our Products – Aluminium, Steel, Cookware & More
products.metadescription: Browse our full product catalog: profiles, sheets, claddings, gutters, cookware, kitchen utensils, aluminium joinery, and industrial solutions.

products.title: Aluminum products designed to last

desCuisine.d4: Robust and durable products used in both household and professional kitchens

desConstruction.d2: Standard and custom profiles (flat, U-shaped, T-shaped, L-shaped, tubular...)

meta.title: Terms and Conditions - Alubassa
meta.description: Read the terms of use of Alubassa's website and the rules related to our services, products, and liability.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the www.alubassa.com website, you fully accept these terms and conditions. If you disagree with any part of them, please refrain from using our site.

sections.title: 2. Website Access
sections.content: The site is accessible free of charge to any user with an Internet connection. All related costs (hardware, software, Internet access) are the sole responsibility of the user.

sections.title: 3. Intellectual Property
sections.content: All elements on this website—including texts, images, graphics, logos, videos, icons, and sounds—are the exclusive property of Alubassa or its partners. Any reproduction, distribution, or adaptation without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited.

sections.title: 4. Products and Services
sections.content: Alubassa presents the main characteristics of its products for informational purposes only. Images and descriptions are non-contractual. We reserve the right to modify technical specifications, materials, or finishes at any time without notice.

sections.title: 5. Prices and Availability
sections.content: Prices, when mentioned, are indicative and may vary depending on market conditions. Product availability is not guaranteed; we recommend contacting us for confirmation.

sections.title: 6. Liability
sections.content: Alubassa shall not be held responsible for any errors or omissions in the content provided, nor for any temporary or permanent unavailability of the website. Users are solely responsible for how they use the information provided.

sections.title: 7. Personal Data
sections.content: Some data may be collected via our forms (contact, quote requests). These data are used solely for communication between Alubassa and the user, in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: 8. External Links
sections.content: This site may contain links to third-party websites. Alubassa has no control over these websites and disclaims any responsibility for their content or data practices.

sections.title: 9. Changes to Terms
sections.content: Alubassa reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Users are encouraged to review them regularly.

sections.title: 10. Governing Law
sections.content: These terms are governed by Cameroonian law. In case of dispute, the competent courts shall be those of Alubassa's registered office.

sections.title: 11. Contact
sections.content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us at: contact@alubassa.com.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Alubassa
meta.description: Learn how Alubassa protects your personal data and respects your privacy in accordance with the law.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect certain personal data when you fill out our contact form or request a quote. This may include: name, email address, phone number, company, etc.

sections.title: 2. Use of Data
sections.content: Collected data is used solely to contact you, respond to your inquiries, and improve our services. Your data will never be sold or shared with third parties without your consent.

sections.title: 3. Cookies
sections.content: This site may use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies at any time.

sections.title: 4. Security
sections.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access.

sections.title: 5. Data Retention
sections.content: Your data is kept for a maximum of 3 years unless otherwise required by law.

sections.title: 6. Your Rights
sections.content: In accordance with applicable laws, you have the right to access, rectify, or delete your data. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@alubassa.com.

sections.title: 7. Changes
sections.content: This policy may be updated at any time. We recommend checking it regularly.
